Text: ImportantNote forwarded message attached Charles R Allured Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online XApparentlyTo via web Dec PST Received from web HELO webmailyahoocom by mtamailyahoocom with SMTP Dec PST Date Dec From To Subject failure delivery ContentLength Message from yahoocom Unable to deliver message to the following addresses does not like recipient Remote host said User unknown Giving up on Original message follows ReturnPath MessageID Received from by webmailyahoocom via HTTP Thu Dec PST Date Thu Dec PST From Chas Allured Subject Fwd Office Closure To Cc Ben Smith MIMEVersion ContentType multipartmixed boundary ContentType textplain charsetusascii ContentDisposition inline I have asked both Ben Smith and Dan Leff to confirm that these expenses will be paid so I can close the office in Nevada It is a small amount but I can not cover the cost for Enron out of my personal funds The total outstanding is Can you please see that this gets paid ASAP Thanks and God Bless Chuck Allured Note forwarded message attached Charles R Allured Do You Yahoo Send your FREE holiday greetings online ContentType messagerfc XApparentlyTo via web Dec PST Received from web HELO webmailyahoocom by mtamailyahoocom with SMTP Dec PST Received from by webmailyahoocom via HTTP Mon Dec PST Date Mon Dec PST From Chas Allured Subject Office Closure To Cc MIMEVersion ContentType textplain charsetusascii ContentLength Ben Leticia I hope this is not the last time we get to work together As we discussed I will have some office closure expenses that I will need to get reimbursed for I have been locked out of the server so I can not enter them into the xms system This amounts to the following ATT wireless November Billing Termination charge Nevada Bell November billing est DSL Setup fee November November DSL monthly fee Termination Charge of one year contract Total Can you please process this and get to me asap so I can disconnect all of the services You can reach me at or Thanks for all of the memories and may God bless us all Chuck Charles R Allured Do You Yahoo Buy the perfect holiday gifts at Yahoo Shopping
